paper_abstract: This paper proposes a jitter tolerant continuous-time sigma-delta A-D converter structure as well as its design method. This method transforms a conventionally designed sigma-delta A-D converter into a jitter tolerant one. Jitter tolerance is provided by the modified feedback signal paths and a consequently inserted digital LPF. This method is applicable independently of a system order and the other specifications.
paper_title: Jitter tolerant continuous-time sigma-delta A-D converter employing in-loop low-pass filter
